channel.title: South Park and the 'N' Word
channel.description:
Wednesday March 11, 2007(lol) South park released an episode using the 'N' word over 40 times.CNN went on the streets to find out how people felt about it(The video is linked at the bottom).In my opinion anyone can use any word at any given time if they want to.South Park was made in the U.S. meaning they have the first amendment protecting them.About the 'N' word, its just a word.I think it came from one of the African countries (Niger).So it should stay that way with no meaning at all.Black people shouldn't be offended by it, neither should any other race unless they absolutely know what it means and where it came from.I know no black person who knows what it means or where it originated from, they are just offended by it because of the use of the word during racism times back then with those useless black/white laws.Also, if people just say it but don't mean it, it will start a whole huge problem in the community, just like the episode.
http://youtube.com/watch?v=RI59gfYAjJs
